FuncDef:
The cmp request entity command configures an entity name to be used by a device to request a certificate through CMPv2.
The undo cmp request entity command cancels the configuration.
By default, no entity name is configured to be used by a device to request a certificate through CMPv2.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an entity name to be used by a device to request a certificate through CMPv2.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When applying for a certificate, you need to specify the entity name to be used.
Prerequisites
The entity name you specify must be the name of the entity created using the pki entity command.
